title: In Deep: Chase & Emma
description: "In Deep: Chase & Emma" is a sports romance, and the first book in the 'All In' series.Chase is an Olympic swimmer going for gold. Focused.Driven.Intense. Emma is a blogger going for the scoop and she has the perfect in.She’s gotten herself hired as his physical therapist. With all that intimate time together -- the secrets from his past don’t stand a chance -- And neither does she ...Note: In Deep is a standalone hot, contemporary romance. It’s the first of four standalone in the “All In” series, which can be read in any order.
author: Callie Harper
